about_the_game:
Experience the story of the Grugs, the first human family made up of Hector, Brumhilda, Brat and Lola!

Each of these funky cavemen offer a different playstyle, with advantages, disadvantages and unique skills to use, each having more use when it comes to different challenges!

Face raptors, pterodactyls, wooly mamoths, polar bears, lots and lots of giant deadly boulders, along many other dangers, in this treacherous prehistorical world!

Follow the comicbook style, charming and colourful story of the family!
detailed_description:
Experience the story of the Grugs, the first human family made up of Hector, Brumhilda, Brat and Lola!

Each of these funky cavemen offer a different playstyle, with advantages, disadvantages and unique skills to use, each having more use when it comes to different challenges!

Face raptors, pterodactyls, wooly mamoths, polar bears, lots and lots of giant deadly boulders, along many other dangers, in this treacherous prehistorical world!

Follow the comicbook style, charming and colourful story of the family!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, cabaple of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, cabaple of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: The Grugs: Origins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GhZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: The Grugs: Origins is a creative mix between runner and platformer games, mixing the challenging elements of both into it's gameplay, while allowing for player expression with four playable characters with multiple available skills to use.
